PHRASE.LANG: kName
Armour Pack: Hunter, Raptor and Rust Marine
Ensemble Armure : Hunter, Raptor et Rust Marine
Rüstungsbündel: Hunter, Raptor und Rust Marine
Pacchetto di armature: Hunter, Raptor e Rust Marine
Pack de armadura: Hunter, Raptor y Rust Marine
아머 팩: 사냥꾼, 랩터, 녹슨 해병 (여성)
Armor Pack: Hunter, Raptor and Rust Marine (Women)
裝甲服裝組：獵人、猛禽及鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊(女用)
裝甲服裝組：獵人、猛禽及鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊(女用)
Armor Pack: Hunter, Raptor and Rust Marine
kDesc

Contains the following three full Armour sets for you to mix and match, Hunter Light Armour Set, Raptor Medium Armour Set and Rust Marine Heavy Armour Set, contains the following fifteen parts: 
 
 1. Hunter - Light Field Body Armour 
 2. Hunter - Light Field Boots 
 3. Hunter - Light Field Glove 
 4. Hunter - Light Field Helmet 
 5. Hunter - Light Field Leg Armour 
 6. Raptor - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 7. Raptor - Medium Assault Boots 
 8. Raptor - Medium Assault Gloves 
 9. Raptor - Medium Assault Helmet 
 10. Raptor - Medium Assault Leg Armour 
 11. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 12. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Boots 
 13. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 14. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 15. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

Vous n'aurez que l'embarras du choix avec ces trois ensembles Armure complets (Ensemble Armure Légère Hunter, Ensemble Armure Moyenne Raptor & Ensemble Armure Lourde Rust Marine), contenant les quinze éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Hunter - Gilet de terrain léger 
 2. Hunter - Bottes de terrain légères 
 3. Hunter - Gant de terrain légers 
 4. Hunter - Casque de terrain léger 
 5. Hunter - Jambières de terrain légères 
 6. Raptor - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 7. Raptor - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 8. Raptor - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 9. Raptor - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 10. Raptor - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 11. Rust Marine - Gilet de combat lourd 
 12. Rust Marine - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 13. Rust Marine - Gants de combat lourds 
 14. Rust Marine - Casque de combat lourd 
 15. Rust Marine - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Enthält die folgenden drei kompletten Rüstungssets für Dich zum Kombinieren: Leichtes Rüstungsset Hunter, Mittelschweres Rüstungsset Raptor & Schweres Rüstungsset Rust Marine; umfasst die folgenden fünfzehn Teile: 
 
 1. Hunter - Leichte Panzerweste 
 2. Hunter - Leichte Stiefel 
 3. Hunter - Leichte Handschuhe 
 4. Hunter - Leichter Helm 
 5. Hunter - Leichte Beinrüstung 
 6. Raptor - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 7. Raptor - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 8. Raptor - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 9. Raptor - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 10. Raptor - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 11. Rust Marine - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 12. Rust Marine - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 13. Rust Marine - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 14. Rust Marine - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 15. Rust Marine - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Contiene i tre set di armature seguenti che possono essere mischiati tra loro: set di armatura leggera Hunter, set di armatura media Raptor e set di armatura pesante Rust Marine. Contiene i 15 componenti seguenti: 
 
 1. Hunter - armatura per il corpo da combattimento leggero 
 2. Hunter - stivali da combattimento leggero 
 3. Hunter - guanti da combattimento leggero 
 4. Hunter - casco da combattimento leggero 
 5. Hunter - armatura per le gambe da combattimento leggero 
 6. Raptor - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 7. Raptor - stivali d'assalto medio 
 8. Raptor - guanti d'assalto medio 
 9. Raptor - casco d'assalto medio 
 10. Raptor - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio 
 11. Rust Marine - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 12. Rust Marine - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 13. Rust Marine - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 14. Rust Marine - casco da combattimento pesante 
 15. Rust Marine - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

Contiene los tres siguientes sets de armadura, que podrás combinar entre ellos: Hunter ligera, Raptor media y Rust Marine pesada. Se compone de las 15 partes siguientes: 
 
 1. Hunter - Armadura corporal de campo ligera 
 2. Hunter - Botas de campo ligeras 
 3. Hunter - Guantes de campo ligeros 
 4. Hunter - Casco de campo ligero 
 5. Hunter - Armadura de campo ligera para pierna 
 6. Raptor - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 7. Raptor - Botas de asalto medias 
 8. Raptor - Guantes de asalto medios 
 9. Raptor - Casco de asalto medio 
 10. Raptor - Armadura de asalto media para pierna 
 11. Rust Marine - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 12. Rust Marine - Botas de combate pesadas 
 13. Rust Marine - Guantes de combate pesados 
 14. Rust Marine - Casco de combate pesado 
 15. Rust Marine - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

다음과 같은 세 개의 방어구 세트의 15개 아이템을 포함합니다. 자유로운 연출이 가능합니다 - 사냥꾼 경량 방어구 세트, 랩터 중형 방어구 세트, 녹슨 해병 강화 방어구 세트:
 
 1. 사냥꾼 - 경량 야전 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 사냥꾼 - 경량 야전부츠 (여성)
 3. 사냥꾼 - 경량 야전장갑 (여성)
 4. 사냥꾼 - 경량 야전헬멧 (여성)
 5. 사냥꾼 - 경량 야전 하체방어구 (여성)
 6. 랩터 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (여성)
 7. 랩터 - 중형 돌격부츠 (여성)
 8. 랩터 - 중형 돌격장갑 (여성)
 9. 랩터 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (여성)
 10. 랩터 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (여성)
 11. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (여성)
 12. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투부츠 (여성)
 13. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투장갑 (여성)
 14. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투헬멧 (여성)
 15. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

Contains the following three full armor sets for you to mix and match, Hunter Light Armor Set, Raptor Medium Armor Set and Rust Marine Heavy Armor Set, contains the following fifteen parts:
 
 1. Hunter - Light Field Body Armor (Women)
 2. Hunter - Light Field Boots (Women)
 3. Hunter - Light Field Glove (Women)
 4. Hunter - Light Field Helmet (Women)
 5. Hunter - Light Field Leg Armor (Women)
 6. Raptor - Medium Assault Body Armor (Women)
 7. Raptor - Medium Assault Boots (Women)
 8. Raptor - Medium Assault Gloves (Women)
 9. Raptor - Medium Assault Helmet (Women)
 10. Raptor - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Women)
 11. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Women)
 12. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Boots (Women)
 13. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Gloves (Women)
 14. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Helmet (Women)
 15. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Women) [#Legal]

包括獵人輕型裝甲服裝組、猛禽中型裝甲服裝組及鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊重型裝甲服裝組3套裝甲服裝組，可用作自由配搭。當中包括下列15個部分：
 
 1. 獵人 - 輕型野外護甲(女用)
 2. 獵人 - 輕型野外靴子(女用)
 3. 獵人 - 輕型野外手套(女用)
 4. 獵人 - 輕型野外頭盔(女用)
 5. 獵人 - 輕型野外護脛(女用)
 6. 猛禽 - 中型突擊護甲(女用)
 7. 猛禽 - 中型突擊靴子(女用)
 8. 猛禽 - 中型突擊手套(女用)
 9. 猛禽 - 中型突擊頭盔(女用)
 10. 猛禽 - 中型突擊護脛(女用)
 11. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊 - 重型戰鬥護甲(女用)
 12. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊 - 重型戰鬥靴子(女用)
 13. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊 - 重型戰鬥手套(女用)
 14. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(女用)
 15. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊 - 重型戰鬥護脛(女用) [#Legal]
